LiveContainer is an app launcher for iOS that allows users to run multiple iOS applications without needing to install each one individually. It bypasses typical app installation limits and signing requirements, especially when Just-In-Time (JIT) compilation is available, offering a way to manage and launch apps more flexibly.

PicoShare is a minimalist, self-hostable file-sharing service written in Go. It provides direct download links for any file type and size without re-encoding or resizing, ensuring users receive their files exactly as uploaded. It supports local storage and cloud data replication via Litestream for persistence.
